app.title: PF2e Character Master
app.subtitle: Step-by-step assistant for creating and leveling up characters.

ancestry.description: Choose an ancestry for your future character. The list is loaded from the PF2e ancestries compendium.
ancestry.empty: Could not find an ancestries compendium or it is empty. Please check your PF2e system setup.

details.featuresNone: This ancestry has no built-in features.
details.hint: Select an ancestry on the left to see its details.

heritage.description: Choose a heritage available to the selected ancestry. Universal heritages are also available.
heritage.empty: No heritages were found for this ancestry in the compendia.
heritage.noAncestry: Select an ancestry first to see available heritages.
heritage.hint: Select a heritage on the left to view its description.

background.description: Choose a background for your character. The list is loaded from the PF2e backgrounds compendium.
background.empty: Could not find a backgrounds compendium or it is empty.

details.featuresNone: This background has no built-in features.
details.hint: Select a background on the left to see its details.

class.description: Choose a class for your character. The list is loaded from the PF2e classes compendium.
class.empty: Could not find a classes compendium or it is empty.

details.proficienciesNone: This class has no built-in proficiencies.
details.noSpellcasting: This class is not a spellcaster or has no base spellcasting.
details.noKeyChoices: This class has no built-in key choices.
details.progressionNone: No detailed progression is defined for this class.
details.hint: Select a class on the left to see its details.

abilities.description: A short summary of your current ability modifiers based on the selected ancestry, background and class.
abilities.hint: These modifiers will be used by the PF2e system when resolving rolls. You can still adjust your base ability scores directly on the character sheet if needed.

common.notImplemented: This step of the master is not implemented yet.
